page.title: 05THE CANAL SHOP
page.content:
{Mr. and Mrs. Morris}own a shop alongside the Llangollen/Ellesmere Canal.{They have lived there since {1971 .}In addition they keep beef cattle on 9 acres of rented land,of which 4 are owned by the Water Board.The cost of keeping the cattle has gone up a lot in the last few years.{The corn bill for keeping 13 {cattle for a year is Â£884.}
{ The shop is next to a lock which {is one of 2 in 24 miles.}Most of the customers at the shop are people who are taking holidays on the boats, although some local people call there. {About 150 boats a week travel past in {the holiday season}which is in the months of{June,July,August,September.
